captains.name: Q (Female)
captains.text: ACTION: Place 1 additional Shield Token beside your ship. When taking damage this round, remove this Shield Token first. If all of your Shields are destroyed by a single attack this round and your ship suffers any damage to it's Hull from that attack, the damage is increased by +1 normal damage. If the Shield Token is unused remove it during the End Phase.

captains.name: Q
captains.text: ACTION: Rotate your ship 180-degrees. Place a number of Auxiliary Power tokens beside your ship equal to the speed of the maneuver you revealed this round.

admirals.name: Q
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Rotate your ship 180-degrees. Place a number of Auxiliary Power tokens beside your ship equal to the speed of the maneuver you revealed this round.

upgrades.name: Quinn
upgrades.text: When your ship is defending, during the Compare Results step, you may discard this card to cancel 1 [hit] or [crit] result.

upgrades.name: Think Fast
upgrades.text:
During the Roll Attack Dice step, when attacking with a Primary Weapon, you may discard this card and disable 1 of your other Upgrades to gain +1 attack die for that attack.
OR
During the Roll Defense Dice step, you may discard this card and disable 1 of your other Upgrades to roll +1 defense die.

upgrades.name: Q2
upgrades.text:
This Upgrade counts as either a [crew], an [talent], a [tech], or a [weapon] Upgrade (your choice).

Whenever a friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship receives damage, you may discard this card to transfer all of that damage to your ship.
